title: This is the price of the doggie in the window. T206 Waddell (Pitching). Chase add.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: This is the price of the doggie in the window. T206 Waddell (Pitching). Chase add.
posts.post_content:
T206 Waddell (Pitching)-flaws are obvious-$125.00 (sold)

Unless otherwise noted on the item, s/h outside of California, Oregon and the state of Washington is now $4.75. In the matter of shipping to California, Oregon and Washington, the s/h because of the distance from Pittsburgh is $5.00. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

Pm

Sent from my SM-F926U using Tapatalk
With exceptions of Dahlen and Marquard, the other cards just posted are $110.00 each.
Walsh and Wallace have sold at $100.00 apiece.

All remaining cards are $110.00 except the two I sold and the Marquard with hands to the sides, which is $130.00. Also, the Dahlen is $105.00.

Also, here are three more cards at $100.00 each. These three have now sold.
I'll take all 3 (edited to add Brown, Brown and Joss)
It looks like maybe some kid wrote "dead" on the Joss card - a little creepy.

Clarke has sold.

Dahlen, Marquard portrait and Bresnahan remain.
Chase-pencil mark and crease top left. also, to the right of the head and rounding of the corner. Erasure mark to the right of the neck-$45.00 (sold)
I'll take the Dahlen and Bresnahan if still available.

[quote name="daniel.1983" post=2219038]I'll take the Dahlen and Bresnahan if still available.[/QUOTE]

PMed you.

Dahlen at $105.00 and Bresnahan at $110.00 have sold.

Only Marquard at $110.00 and Huggins at $130.00 remain.
Marquard and Huggins offered for a combined $200.00 plus s/h.
I'll take the Marquard and Huggins - PM incoming
All are now sold. Thank you everyone.

[quote name="Brian Van Horn" post=2219640]All are now sold. Thank you everyone.[/QUOTE]

Any other t206 for sale?
